name: EDO COMPLEX ep.1: Breach
description:
Controls ( in game ):

Arrow keys -- move, jump, swim, swing off poles
Spacebar and Down Key shoots
Shift -- restart level
Esc -- Main Menu/ quit

Melee attacks are automatically triggered on enemy impact. Touching enemies dosn't hurt you, only their shots do.

Picking up a gun weapon makes it shoot unlimited ammo for 20 seconds
